item.title: Running LLM and Stable Diffusion Locally on My Low-End Hardware
item.description: Let’s start with my PC spec. Components Parts Processor Intel i5 10400ES iGPU Intel UHD Graphics 630 Motherboard AsRock B460M Pro RAM Adata DDR4-2666 4GB x2 dGPU N/A When it comes to AI, most people probably think it requires a beefy GPU to run smoothly and quickly. And that’s true. But just how bad will it be when running AI on a low-end GPU? How to run LLM and Stable Diffusion on Intel UHD 630 iGPU?
